languages.text: "Рекаф обязательно будет. Заваренный в твоем нахальном черепе — если от него что-то останется".
"The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
languages.original_text: "Рекаф обязательно будет. Заваренный в твоем нахальном черепе — если от него что-то останется".

traits.locale_text: "Recaf will be prepared soon. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
"Recaf will be prepared soon. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
"The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
"The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
"The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."
"The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

languages.text: «Al café no le queda mucho. Pienso prepararlo en tu cráneo, escoria insolente... si es que sobrevive».
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: «Al café no le queda mucho. Pienso prepararlo en tu cráneo, escoria insolente... si es que sobrevive».

languages.text: “马上就煮好了。我准备拿你的脑壳煮咖啡，你这厚颜无耻的混蛋。刚好你脑子里空空如也，连清理都可以省掉了。”
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: “马上就煮好了。我准备拿你的脑壳煮咖啡，你这厚颜无耻的混蛋。刚好你脑子里空空如也，连清理都可以省掉了。”

languages.text: « Rassurez-vous, vous ne perdez rien pour attendre. Je m'en servirai une tasse dans votre crâne, misérable {mf|insolent|insolente}... pour peu qu'il en reste plus que des miettes, bien sûr. »
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: « Rassurez-vous, vous ne perdez rien pour attendre. Je m'en servirai une tasse dans votre crâne, misérable {mf|insolent|insolente}... pour peu qu'il en reste plus que des miettes, bien sûr. »

languages.text: 「模造コーヒーがもうすぐ準備できる。お前のスカルでそれを淹れてやる、生意気な人でなしよ―何かが残ればの話だがな」
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: 「模造コーヒーがもうすぐ準備できる。お前のスカルでそれを淹れてやる、生意気な人でなしよ―何かが残ればの話だがな」

languages.text: "Kahfen birazdan hazır olacak. Hatta kafatasında pişireceğim arsız köpek. Gerçi kafatasından en ufak eser kalmayabilir."
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: "Kahfen birazdan hazır olacak. Hatta kafatasında pişireceğim arsız köpek. Gerçi kafatasından en ufak eser kalmayabilir."

languages.text: "Den bekommt Ihr noch früh genug. Ich werde ihn in Eurem Schädel aufbrühen ... sofern davon noch etwas übrig ist.
languages.original_text: "The recaf will be ready soon enough. I will brew it in your skull, you impudent wretch — if there is anything left of it."

traits.locale_text: "Den bekommt Ihr noch früh genug. Ich werde ihn in Eurem Schädel aufbrühen ... sofern davon noch etwas übrig ist.
